column1: #Text=Harper promised 15% discount of 1000 dollars spent on children's sports activities.
#Text=Mulcair promises 15 dollar a day child care.
#Text=Harper helps rich parents who can afford 1000 dollars sports activities per child.
#Text=Mulcair cares for the middle and poor class.
#Text=Lot of parents could not afford second child because of huge child care expenses.
#Text=We should not entirely depend on the immigration population.
#Text=If there will be any economic armagaddon like greece, all the immigrants will disappear and make the situation worse, but canadian born people will never leave this beautiful country.
